Name: 攻城夺将CFG：Combat for General
About the game: Game intro: CFG: Combat for General!is a creative simulation game in the background of three kingdoms period of China. General's unique on all servers. Thousands of Generals available, no Gacha required. Get your General by capturing and recruiting now. Real-time Strategy Deploy your troops, and restrain the enemy, every step you move will change the result. Real-time Scheme Display your wisdom and release the schemes, various schemes help to win the battle. Thousands of cities lie on the map Abundant cities are available. Conquest anyone you like from towns, counties, states, royal, and imperial cities. High Historical reductivity The role, scene, and gear modelling are based on historical documentation and reduce the human culture in the late Han dynasty. Contact Us: QQ Group: 596846807
